title: SMC_CAMTAPPETTYPE (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_CAMTAPPETTYPE :
Determines in which direction the tappet has to be passed.

rows.Name: TAPPET_pos
rows.Comment: Tappet action active when the axis passes in positive direction.

rows.Name: TAPPET_all
rows.Comment: Tappet action active when the axis passes in any direction.

rows.Name: TAPPET_neg
rows.Comment: Tappet action active when the axis passes in negative direction.
